6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Conjure Fey
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You summon a fey creature to an unoccupied space that you can see within range.

6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Find the Path
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: This spell allows you to find the shortest, most direct physical route to a specific fixed location that you are familiar with on the same plane of existence.

6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Heal
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: A surge of positive energy washes through the creature, causing it to regain 70 hit points.

6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Heroes' Feast
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You bring forth a great feast, including magnificent food and drink.

6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Move Earth
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: Choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range.

6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Sunbeam
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line.

6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Transport via Plants
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: This spell creates a magical link between a Large or larger inanimate plant within range and another plant, at any distance, on the same plane of existence.

6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Wall of Thorns
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You create a wall of tough, pliable, tangled brush bristling with needle-sharp thorns.

6thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Wind Walk
6thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You and up to ten willing creatures you can see within range assume a gaseous form for the duration.
